post.body: I've resolved myself to young folk having sex, but yea, it's depressing if I let me self think about it.
she's having my babyyyyyy
is pregnant! She's looking at pregnancy calendars to try to find the perfect one.
@technosailor it IS fun. Looking for something to disagree with @queenofspain right now
is growling
I know how fake bf feels. I walked around for months with my one sock and loved it. :-)
some are, some aren't.
says there is no ice on the car which means she wants me to go to Starbucks
sorry, I'm the one with the camera so there are very few photos of me. I'll get someone to take one later. Uploading video now
no kidding, eh? it's cold here, heh. :-)
thank you! Wait til you see the hat TW knitted for me, heh.
they are twice as big, well the two big ones. Liz has grown a little but not twice as much. :-)
is making me another Xmas gift - homemade cheese straws. She likes me a LOT.
In car crawling on waukegan
Power went out
OK Must leave. I hope my window will roll down.
I hate getting dressed because my clothes, in the dresser, are FREEZING. I need a heated dresser or something.
oO(I wish I knew how to use a scarf.)
http://boards.webmd.com/webx?THD@@.89b0458d!thdchild=.89b0458d/1 we don't do missionary... I'm claustrophobic. (Awesome stuff here.)
OK must put on clothing. School run, in the blizzard. I hate Chicago suburbs
http://boards.webmd.com/webx?THDX@@.89b05010!thdchild=.89b05010 Can your vagina still be open a year later?
http://boards.webmd.com/webx?THDX@@.89b04fe6!thdchild=.89b04fe6 He wanted to have sex, since he'd been in jail I expected that, but...
Pass the popcorn.
http://www.blogher.com/ants-and-fall I would kill for an ant problem right now
ok ok she's not really, but wouldn't it be funny if she was.
Omg no power flickering
snow snow snow snow and more freaking snow. on top of ice, which makes it even more wonderful to live here. when is spring?
the next time I am tempted to create multiple names on a site, someone STOP ME.
I thought I bought MIchelle a book but now I cannot find that book. Did I not buy it because I'd already bought her a bunch of books?
We are listening to The Magic of Christmas (Columbia House) Brings my childhood right back. Also makes me LMAO
The Flaming Lips are loud.
Look at the scarves! http://flickr.com/photos/flamingohouse/3135617892/
Listening to Flaming Lips vinyl Michelle got for Christmas
The scarves for the kids were a hit. Thank you Hanks Yarn. (also they smell good thanks to Haldesoap)
I got a mudflap girl!
Merry Christmas why am I awake?
Ack it is midnight! Oh well, merry Christmas!
where is the Flip?
the snowman christmas cookies have silver penises, these kids are nuts
it was much quieter here yesterday. wonder why.
